plugin.title: Autostarter
plugin.author: LongTail Video
plugin.description: Use this small plugin if you want a video on your site to automatically start the first X times a user visits your website. The plugin drops this history in a cookie, so after the Xth time the video won't autostart. Great for promos you want your users to see, but not annoy.

flashvar.name: count
flashvar.description: The number of times a specific video automatically starts.
